name: Altaria
author: rika
flavor_text: On sunny days, it flies freely through the sky and blends into the clouds. It sings in a beautiful soprano.

attacks.name: Humming Charge
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Energy cards and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Cotton Wings
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent’s next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks.
